resources.string: "\nStay Well" is your one-stop solution for hotel bookings, offering convenience with just a single click. With our user-friendly interface, you can effortlessly find and reserve your ideal accommodation from a vast selection of hotels. Our commitment to providing exceptional service extends around the clock, ensuring assistance whenever you need it, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
1234 Main Street \n Cityville, ST 12345\n United States

Getting up in the morning and enjoying your favourite meal outdoors, in front of the pool and surrounded by palm trees is a delight. 


A very cozy breakfast buffet where you wont know what to choose first: bread, homemade jam, fresh fruit, cereals, cold meats, freshly cooked eggs, vegetables, pancakes, crêpes and Canarian sweets. 


There are also options for vegans, gluten intolerant, lactose intolerant, etc.
Enjoy the sun of the Mackinac Islands while your palate is delighted with a light lunch buffet, where fresh salads with local products, paella and barbecues are the protagonists.

Enjoy a different theme every night at your buffet in the "Las Palmeras" restaurant. Special dishes from different countries that will take you around the world of flavours.\n\n
And remember with each themed dinner you can enjoy shows or musical performances to fill the night with joy.

We propose you to enjoy the 
 different animation and entertainment 
 options that surprise our guests every week: 
 shows, magic, live music, games, sports activities 
 during the day, and special entertainment for children.
 Whether in our indoor or outdoor facilities, 
 we offer a wide range of sporting activities, both in summer and winter.

At Green Garden Ecoresort we have planned endless activities, games and crafts for the little ones to stimulate their creative side during the holidays:
 bracelet and macaroni necklace workshops, paper flowers, pirate hats, 
 drawing, painting, face painting, treasure hunts and much more! 
 

Every Thursday we celebrate our magnificent "Pool Party" where we introduce our staff and where our customers can enjoy the foam party or our inflatable dolphin and taste our outdoor barbecue.

Children's Activities 
 
 We have planned a host of activities for the little ones to stimulate their creative side during the holidays: bracelet and macaroni necklace workshops, paper flowers, treasure hunts, face painting, pirate hats, drawing, painting and much more! 
 

Crafts, games, workshops, outdoor activities and a mini disco complete our range of fun activities.

Weddings and seasonal events 
 
 Elevating your happily ever after is what we do best that\’s why our expert team works together to ensure that the catering menu is customized to your taste, the overall design is exactly what you want, and the ceremony is unforgettable.

 
 Contact us today to learn more.

Enjoy a spa day 
 
 Just steps from your room, discover an oasis of relaxation. In partnership with Windy City Massage, the Kaldan Hotel offers onsite spa services including personalized massages, body treatments, and facials. 
 Treat yourself to high-quality services without ever leaving your hotel. To book, call 312-946-3000.
\n Deluxe, First Floor or Ground Floor, breakfast included, twin with balcony - 357 sqft \n Max Guests: 2
\n Deluxe, Ground Floor, breakfast included, pool facing, king with balcony and bathtub - 485 Sqft \n Max Guests: 3
\n SUBSCRIBE TO THE NEWSLETTER IF YOU WANT TO BE THE FIRST TO RECEIVE OUR OFFERS
